Contact Us

Contact information for the Town of Wiley including town hall, emergency services, and online contact form

  1. Home
  2. /
  3. Contact Us

Contact Information

Town Hall

Address:
123 Main Street
Wiley, State 12345

Phone: (555) 123-4567
Email: info@townofwiley.gov

Hours:
Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM

Emergency Services

Emergency: 911
Police (Non-Emergency): (555) 123-4569
Fire Department: (555) 123-4570
Public Works: (555) 123-4571

For immediate assistance during business hours, please call or visit town hall. For after-hours emergencies, dial 911.
